mapper.select: select black_no as blackNo, black_start as blackStart, black_end as blackEnd, black_id as blackId, black_ty as blackTy from reading_black where black_id=#{memberId} and black_ty=0

select reading_no as readingNo, reading_time as readingTime, reading_day as readingDay, reading_num as readingNum, reading_id as readingId, reading_name as readingName, reading_ty as readingTy, reading_checkout as readingCheckOut from reading where reading_day=#{readingDay} and reading_num=#{readingNum}

select reading_no as readingNo, reading_time as readingTime, reading_day as readingDay, reading_num as readingNum, reading_id as readingId, reading_name as readingName, reading_ty as readingTy, reading_checkout as readingCheckOut from reading where reading_day=#{readingDay} and reading_id=#{readingId}

mapper.delete: delete from reading where reading_day=#{readingDay} and reading_id=#{readingId}
